name: accordance
title: Accordance
description: Access verses and search Accordance Bible modules from Raycast
author: entupo

commands.name: get-verses
commands.title: Get Verses
commands.subtitle: Accordance
commands.description: Gets verses and displays them in Raycast

commands.name: read-verses
commands.title: Read Bible
commands.subtitle: Accordance
commands.description: Read through Bible verses sequentially starting from a reference

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Texts
commands.subtitle: Accordance
commands.description: Quick search of your default Accordance text.

commands.name: search-advanced
commands.title: Advanced Search
commands.subtitle: Accordance
commands.description: Search Accordance using various tools and resources

commands.name: browse-library
commands.title: Browse Library
commands.subtitle: Accordance
commands.description: Browse all Accordance modules and open or search them.

preferences.name: workspacePath
preferences.title: Workspace Files Path
preferences.description: Path to the folder containing Accordance workspace files (.accord)

preferences.name: defaultText
preferences.title: Default Bible Text
preferences.description: The default Bible text module to use for verse lookups and searches

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
